comment.body: What differents are with Blue hub and Red?
Haha, okey. I also chose blue so as i see it`s perfect choice.
I use Arch Linux over 8 years. I cant use any other system or Linux distribution. Pacman manager and all with Arch make me lazy and i love this.
Me too.
Most porn sites use html5 now.
@Musickiller: Andrewm using Kaffie hub (sometimes it don`t want to download). Are you using Debian?

@Musickiller: Maybe delete in ZeroHello KaffieHub and then download it again? I clicked Andrewm profile and see everything. Strange. Hmm i personaly use Arch Linux, as i see Parabola is Arch but only libre packages. If i can ask, why not standard Arch linux?

@Musickiller: Haha, okey. Understand. I`m very lazy, so my Arch installation is so old, that when are some changes in files or programs, and something goes wrong, i close my eyes and pretend that I see nothing. As disadvantage is i cant use any other linux distribution (pacman is so perfect packages manager for me).
As i remember, you can change Arch to Parabola, but in normal day using, Arch have better community and support.
I never partitioning my disk with Arch iso installation. I always use usb with SYSRESCUECD and after partitniong then install Arch with created before partitions.

There was good automatic script installation (called archboot) but its not developed now (last update is from year ago). There is Feliz Arch (but it download and install many useless stuff) and Architect (but it didnt want to work with my computer).

@Musickiller: Mostly because when I edit partitions or create with Arch iso, when I installing Arch it shows me errors and had sometimes problems after booting to system. When i create/edit partition with SRC that never happen (I dont know why, but get use to it).
Everyone have this problem.
@Musickiller: Annoying but yes :P
@Musickiller: Haha, Jeepers Creepers for Arch users :D
Is this Arch with Mate?
@Musickiller: I crazy love LXQt (previous LXDE).
MOC - Music On Console.
You mean, private key dissapear from users.json?

@Musickiller: That`s strange, because I have same accident. On my forum I reached comment limit (i forgot to change limit) and then show me this red alert with "content publish failed". After that in my users.json dissapear private key for my forum. Fortunetly i had backup of users.json, but this is disturbing.
I still use Lumia 520 with Windows Phone 8.1 xd

@Sirenyc: I made account with my own ID (antyhrabia@antyhrabia.bit). Total number of register user change +1, I can use this account with my own hub, but it`s not visible in total registered user page.
@Sirenyc: More Nofish will know the answer. It seems to me that the page with a list of all ZeroMe acounts all registrations each account, but does not show those outside ZeroID.

@Suzo: Really chromium? Thats sad. Each new browser is based on chromium. Thits not good for diversity and different stadards. Creates a hegemony chromium, gecko is forgotten, and only he survived with the other engines.

@Suzo: No, I'm not a developer. But I remember the times when they were all standard network and smack them, because there was a popular IE. All pages written under it. And when came Mozilla, beginning to have problems, because nobody wanted to modify the pages or page to work normally on all browsers to have to add a patch for IE also. Now comes a situation that all browsers on the market use Blink, or are modifications of Chromium and although Gecko age, it is relegated to an unnecessary shadow. Before Servo will replace Gecko it will pass a lot of time, and created an unhealthy situation. Especially that what promotes Chromium does not have to be a good standard. When we have the balance of power in the market, we have a balance and better technologies are used. @weakish: Thanks for answering my question.
